'''''"Han Always Shoots First..."''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to attack an [[Eremite Sword-Dancer]] with a projectile or lunging attack while he is taunting the player.

==Gameplay Notes==
*This only works with the '''Sword Trick''' Variant of their '''Taunt'''.

==Trivia==
* The achievement's name refers to {{w|Han shot first|a famous ''Star Wars'' scene}} where fans argue whether Greedo or {{w|Han Solo}} shot first.
* The description and the condition to get the achievement refer to a scene in {{w|''Raiders of the Lost Ark''}} of the {{w|''Indiana Jones''}} franchise where a man challenged Indiana Jones to a sword fight but he killed the man with his gun instead.
** Both Han Solo and Indiana Jones are acted by {{w|Harrison Ford}}.
